author: The Telegraph
title: Savour fine wines and gourmet meals with Etihad
text: Travelling to Australia with Etihad is an experience you will not soon forget. Etihad Airways benchmarks its in-flight dishes and beverages against those served in leading hotels and restaurants, bringing elegance and culinary perfection to your flight. In Economy Class, the attentive cabin crew provide menus with a choice of three main courses – always with a vegetarian option – accompanied by wines from the world’s best vineyards. Afterwards, there’s a full café service which includes herbal teas, cappuccino and hot chocolate. The airline's Business Class is truly spectacular, with classically elegant finishes and highly personalised service. Dining is on demand, with a menu akin to a top-flight restaurant. The dedicated on-board Food and Beverage Manager can recommend wine pairings from a list of distinguished and boutique labels, providing the perfect accompaniment to your meals. Across all cabins, guests can enjoy on-demand movies, box sets, music, games and live TV Widely recognised as the fastest-growing in the history of commercial aviation, and voted World’s Leading Airline 2014 in the World Travel Awards, Etihad Airways operates daily services from London, Manchester and Edinburgh to Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane and Perth via its hub in Abu Dhabi. An extensive partnership with Virgin Australia means that Etihad’s guests can travel to more than 40 destinations throughout Australia, From August 2015, all three of Etihad’s daily flights from London will be operated by the airline’s flagship A380 which also now connects through to Sydney, consolidating a new era of luxury travel on this popular route. Brisbane also enjoys a flagship product having become one of the first destinations to welcome Etihad’s new Boeing 787-9 Dreamliner – one of the most technologically advanced aircraft in its class. Top-notch: tuck in on demand when you board a Business Class flight with Etihad On board all Etihad’s aircraft and across all cabins, guests enjoy an entertainment system with hundreds of hours of on-demand movies, TV shows and box sets, music, games and live TV channels, all delivered via noise-cancelling headphones. Travelling families get a helping hand from Etihad’s Flying Nanny, who can offer support and advice to parents and assist settling children on board. Etihad’s Business Class guests all benefit from a fully flat bed with access to the aisle, so there will be no disturbing those sleeping around them. Premium passengers also enjoy two one-way transfers with the Etihad Chauffeur‎ service, and lounge access featuring à la carte dining, business centre, family room for children, private bathroom and shower facilities, and a relaxation area. You’ll arrive in style, relaxed and ready to enjoy your great Australian adventure.
